string.name: Name
string.description: Name to display on the throttle for this train.

string.name: User Description
string.description: You can write additional notes about this train here.

int.name: Speed Step Mode
int.description: Configures the Track Protocol options, such as speed step mode or which version of the track protocol to use.

group.name: F0
group.description: F0 is permanently assigned to Light.

int.name: Consist Behavior
int.description: A 'Consist' function will react to changes from every cab. A 'Current Cab Only' function will only react if this Loco is the current cab on the throttle.

int.name: Directional
int.description: When enabled, the F0 function needs to be separately turned on for forward and reverse direction.

int.name: MU switch
int.description: Set this according to where this unit is in a consist or train. As the direction is changed, the headlight will automatically turn off instead of shining onto a coupled train or engine.

group.name: Functions
group.description: Defines what each function button does.

int.name: Display
int.description: Defines how throttles display this function.

int.name: Momentary
int.description: Momentary functions are automatically turned off when you release the respective button on the throttles.

int.name: Consist Behavior
int.description: A 'Consist' function will react to changes from every cab. A 'Current Cab Only' function will only react if this Loco is the current cab on the throttle.

string.name: Description
string.description: Specifies a custom name of this function. To change back to the default function name, set this field to empty.

int.name: Delete From Roster?
int.description: Selecting 'Delete' will remove all settings of this train (like name and function mapping) from the roster. WARNING: this operation cannot be undone.

segment.name: Programming Track Operation
segment.description: Use this component to read and write CVs on the programming track of the command station.

int.name: CV Number
int.description: Number of CV to read or write (1..1024).

int.name: CV Value
int.description: Set 'Operating Mode' and 'CV Number' first, then: hit 'Refresh' to read the entire CV, or enter a value and hit 'Write' to set the CV.

int.name: Bit Change
int.description: Set 'Operating Mode' and 'CV Number' first, then: write 1064 to set the single bit whose value is 64, or 2064 to clear that bit. Write 100 to 107 to set bit index 0 to 7, or 200 to 207 to clear bit 0 to 7. Values outside of these two ranges do nothing.

string.name: Read Bits Decomposition
string.description: Hit Refresh on this line after reading a CV value to see which bits are set.

int.name: Repeat count for verify packets
int.description: How many times a direct mode bit verify packet needs to be repeated for an acknowledgement to be generated.

int.name: Repeat count for reset packets after verify
int.description: How many reset packets to send after a verify.
